title: Listening: a key to problem solving
creator_credit: Paramount Communications, A. Scott Miller, Robert Boucher and Donald R. Ham
brief_description: A dramatised view of how well listening occurs in an office situation. An employee is promoted despite his verbal and non verbal objections, and problems arise. Solutions to the problem are explored as the film points out listening techniques which will reduce problems and improve working relationships.
